argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fvex.1 | |- F e. V |
| 2 |  | fvex.2 | |- A e. W |
| 3 |  | #P_fvexg | |- ( ( F e. V /\ A e. W ) -> ( F ` A ) e. _V ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( F ` A ) e. _V |
\
 Evaluating a set function at a set exists.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro and Jim Kingdon, 28-May-2019.)
